title: Lauren Conrad of 'The Hills' is now mom of two! Check out her adorable birth announcement
text:
CLOSE TV personality, fashion designer and author Lauren Conrad and musician William Tell announced that they will be having a baby in 2017. USA TODAY

Congratulations are due for Lauren Conrad!

"The Hills" alum took to Instagram Wednesday to announce she and husband William Tell have welcomed the latest member of their family.

"Our sweet baby boy, Charlie Wolf Tell, has arrived!" she wrote, along with an illustration of herself holding a baby swaddled in blue. The picture also includes cartoon versions of her husband and their other son, 2-year-old Liam James, who holds a sign reading, "IT'S A BOY!"

The fashion designer shared with fans on Instagram in April that she was expecting a second baby. Wearing a floral dress, she embraced her baby bump.

More: Lauren Conrad shows off baby bump No. 2: 'It's been hard to keep this one to myself'

"It’s been hard to keep this one to myself!" she wrote. "Very excited to share that our family will be getting a little bigger this year"

Conrad, 33, married Tell, a 39-year-old lawyer, in 2014. The couple met on a Valentine's Day blind date set up by friends in 2012, and married at a winery in Santa Ynez, California.

Their first son was born in 2017.

More: Lauren Conrad is a mom! Find out her baby boy's name

Contributing: Sonja Haller, Andrea Mandell

description: Lauren Conrad of "The Hills" has revealed her family's got a new member! See her adorable birth announcement.
